content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the passage as a whole?

choices.label: A retelling of the events leading to a characterâ€™s downfall
A description of an event that illuminates a longstanding cultural tradition
A discussion of a character that provides insights into a particular community
A presentation of an individual who conforms to social expectations

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
